items.title: Awesome Quant
items.content_text:
### Python / Financial Instruments and Pricing

*   [Q-Fin (‚≠ê483)](https://github.com/RomanMichaelPaolucci/Q-Fin) - A Python library for mathematical finance.
*   [Quantsbin (‚≠ê552)](https://github.com/quantsbin/Quantsbin) - Tools for pricing and plotting of vanilla option prices, greeks and various other analysis around them.

### Python / Trading & Backtesting

*   [TuneTA (‚≠ê442)](https://github.com/jmrichardson/tuneta) - TuneTA optimizes technical indicators using a distance correlation measure to a user defined target feature such as next day return.
*   [qf-lib (‚≠ê594)](https://github.com/quarkfin/qf-lib) - QF-Lib is a Python library that provides high quality tools for quantitative finance.

### JavaScript / Data Visualization

*   [QUANTAXIS\_Webkit (‚≠ê38)](https://github.com/yutiansut/QUANTAXIS_Webkit) - An awesome visualization center based on quantaxis.

### Scala / Data Visualization

*   [Scala Quant (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/frankcash/Scala-Quant) - Scala library for working with stock data from IFTTT recipes or Google Finance.

### Reproducing Works, Training & Books / Data Visualization

*   [QuantFinance (‚≠ê420)](https://github.com/PythonCharmers/QuantFinance) - Training materials in quantitative finance.
*   [IPythonScripts (‚≠ê161)](https://github.com/mgroncki/IPythonScripts) - Tutorials about Quantitative Finance in Python and QuantLib: Pricing, xVAs, Hedging, Portfolio Optimisation, Machine Learning and Deep Learning.
*   [Computational-Finance-Course (‚≠ê439)](https://github.com/LechGrzelak/Computational-Finance-Course) - Materials for the course of Computational Finance.
items.content_html:

  • Quantsbin (‚≠ê552) - Tools for pricing and plotting of vanilla option prices, greeks and various other analysis around them.

  • qf-lib (‚≠ê594) - QF-Lib is a Python library that provides high quality tools for quantitative finance.

Reproducing Works, Training & Books / Data Visualization

  • IPythonScripts (‚≠ê161) - Tutorials about Quantitative Finance in Python and QuantLib: Pricing, xVAs, Hedging, Portfolio Optimisation, Machine Learning and Deep Learning.
  • Computational-Finance-Course (‚≠ê439) - Materials for the course of Computational Finance.

items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### Databases

*   [Supabase](https://supabase.io/) - Open source Firebase alternative ([Limited (‚≠ê86k)](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/4934) [self-hosting (‚≠ê86k)](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/issues/4440#issuecomment-992108832))

### Home Assistants

*   Alexa [![](https://shields.tosdr.org/en_190.svg)](https://tosdr.org/en/service/190)
*   Siri [![](https://shields.tosdr.org/en_158.svg)](https://tosdr.org/en/service/158)
*   [Mycroft](https://mycroft.ai/) - The Private and Open Voice Assistant.
*   [Home Assistant](https://www.home-assistant.io/) - Open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first.
items.content_html:
